productInfo.name: EcoBottle 3000
productInfo.description: The world's first self-cleaning water bottle.

marketAnalysis.insight: Consumers are looking for tech that solves hygiene pain points.

scripts.title: The Microscope Reveal
scripts.hook: You are drinking 10,000 bacteria right now.
scripts.body: Microscope shot of dirty bottle rim. Cut to EcoBottle 3000 glowing blue. Narrator explains UV-C technology.

scripts.title: Day in the Life
scripts.body: Montage of hiking, office, gym. Bottle stays cold and clean everywhere.
